entry.title: Teaching & Research Coding CDI at EM Lyon Business School
entry.summary: EM-Lyon is growing our analytics courses. We need talented teachers of Python and data analysis, multiple positions.
entry.content:
Seeking talented, motivated teachers to explain programming and data analysis to non-engineers at EM Lyon Business School:  multiple CDI positions at all levels.  We also seek research programming help, for data collection in business research (brand image, social media...).    If you are capable with Excel and SQL as well as Python, you are a great candidate.   Points for Pandas, API usage, and other data science libraries in Python and/or R.

Our course list is here.   One version of the job is posted here. Please get in touch to discuss even if you do not have all qualifications!
